name: OF_particle_r
description: Snapshot of particle radii in OpenFOAM format (i.e., 'FoamFile' format)

dimensions.name: nParticles
dimensions.description: Number of particles within the simulation

properties.name: version
properties.description: Specifies the version of the FoamFile format

properties.name: class
properties.description: The corresponding OpenFOAM class the entity is based on

properties.name: location
properties.description: Time directory the entity is residing in

properties.name: data
properties.description: List of scalars representing particle radii
